Check the system tray icon for some opti: Check the system tray icon for some options!
You do not have to exactly click on an i: You do not have to exactly click on an item, you just have to click somewhere into its wedge!
Quickly navigate one level up by clickin: Quickly navigate one level up by clicking the center item.
Drag over an item to enter marking mode. If you pause the pointer movement or make a turn, the currently dragged submenu will be opened.
If you keep a key pressed after opening: If you keep a key pressed after opening the menu, you can perform selections by just moving the pointer. This is the fastest way to select items!
Final items are only selected as soon as: Final items are only selected as soon as you release your mouse button in "Marking Mode" or a keyboard key in "Turbo Mode". Use this to explore the menu!
